Hello to all of you,

I made a search here to find someone with the same problem.
Found one thread describing the same problem but couldn't resolve it.
Can someone please help?
I'm running Fedora Core3.
The Heritrix resides in /usr/local/heritrix/
When trying to start Heritrix in the bin folder with the command
./heritrix I get this - "Sun Mar 27 11:15:14 CEST 2005 Starting
heritrix.......................................................
................
.
.
" 
Heritrix can't start.
Do I have do export path for heritrix? Do I have to config a file or
is it enough type this :
# export HERITRIX_HOME=/usr/local/heritrix/

The same thing goes for exporting the java envoirment.
I don't have java where the example is showing in "2.2.2.2. JAVA_HOME"
Anyone with the same problem running Fedora ?

Would really appreciate any help.
